dict.acceptation: 领土，版图；领地；领域，范围；[商]势力范围；

sent.orig: The picture varies from territory to territory.
The third part discusses the application of rules of origin in the integration of territory economics.
sent.trans: 第三大部分分析了原产地规则在世界主要区域经济一体化中的运用。

sent.orig: This new colleague invades my territory.
sent.trans: 这个新同事闯入了我的领地。

sent.orig: Despite interest in his book, the territory's former governor remains a divisive figure.
sent.trans: 尽管不少人对他的书感兴趣，这位前香港总督仍然保持了制造不和谐气氛的形象。

sent.orig: Mechanics is out of my territory.
